name: RISKISR (Post-Jam)
description:
Risk! Reward! Bombs! Particles!
Play through the psyche of a comatose daredevil who still can't stop thinking about taking risks. You can't move very quickly, but are equipped with a teleport... that spawns bombs whenever used!
Defeat packs of enemies in increasingly difficult and sprawling floors of a dungeon while taking as many risks as you can - they'll reward you with more money!

A project extended in my spare time from a concept for Ludum Dare 49 and inspired by Stuffed Wombat's submission to a Miziziziz art kit jam a while back. You can find the original here.
